w:r.w:t: The teacher will teach basic time words by using TPR, sentence frames, and vocabulary. Students will study these words and phrases: time, day, night, minute, hour, clock, minute hand, hour hand,
is 9:00, In the day __, In the night __,
At completion of this lesson, students will be able to:
Recognize, spell, and pronounce the words for time
Spell and pronounce common associated words
Use sets of words in complete sentences
Word List: time, day, night, minute, hour, clock

Explain that little goes first. Visual cue: Show a picture of a family. Explain that little children go
. Explain it is the same with the clock, the little hand goes first.
Identify the hour hand and what number it is pointing to
. Remind the child that “little goes first.” Ask the child what number the little hand is pointing to. Prompt them to say the number 9. Then write 9: in the white space on the right.
